[en]
MENU_TITLE      = \rWHDH\w settings menu
ON              = \r[\yON\r]\w
OFF             = \r[\dOFF\r]\w
TURN_OFF        = \dTurned off\w
TEAMMATES       = Only teammates
OPPONENTS       = Only opponents
OPP_TEAM        = Opponents and teammates
MARKER          = Marker
LINES           = Lines
BOXES           = Boxes
TRANSP_ENTITIES = Transparent entities
EXIT            = Exit
NOT_READY       = WHDH will be available after map change

[ru]
MENU_TITLE      = Меню настроек \rWHDH\w
ON              = \r[\yВКЛ\r]\w
OFF             = \r[\dВЫКЛ\r]\w
TURN_OFF        = \dВыключено\w
TEAMMATES       = Только тиммейты
OPPONENTS       = Только противники
OPP_TEAM        = Противники и тиммейты
MARKER          = Маркер
LINES           = Линии
BOXES           = Боксы
TRANSP_ENTITIES = Прозрачные энтити
EXIT            = Выход
NOT_READY       = WHDH будет доступен после смены карты
